outputs.output_descr:
UNDP role in agricultural sector is to link production to value addition and market. There is four major deliverables: 
1.  A Policy and Investment Framework for Agricultural Growth in place to creae a favorable policy environment and facilitating additional knowledge and investment to the sector.  
2. Diagnosis of the Agricultural sector and preparation of  the Agricultural Growth Programme document  for multi-donor funding and identification of capacity needs at the national and sub-national level for effective implementation of this national programme.
3 Capacity of MOARD, regional bureaux and woreda offices to prepare and implement AGP strengthened.
4. Identification and up-scaling of innovative interventions and best practices, including socail moblization and agricultual marketing and value addition for agricultural development.

project_descr: To enhance national and sub national capacity for improved access of agricultural producers to institutional services, effective marketing system and appropriate technologies and increase in agricultural production and productivity
project_title: Enhancing National Capacity for Agricultural Growth
